World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2024 年 1 月 18 日星期四 21:15:08 GMT 120
Port-Au-Prince residents sheltering in place as violence escalatesHaiti's capital Port-au-Prince was on lockdown on Thursday, as flaming barricades across several neighborhoods forced residents to shelter in place or return home in the latest flare-ups in chronic gang violence plaguing the Caribbean country. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 20:56:30 GMT K3BNSRLNJ5NYXF3ARCTWAOUK7Y https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/port-au-prince-residents-sheltering-place-violence-escalates-2024-01-18/Reuters世界美洲
US urges discussions with China on practical nuclear risk reduction stepsThe United States does not expect formal nuclear arms-control negotiations with China anytime soon, but does want to see a start of discussions on practical risk-reduction measures, a senior White House official said on Thursday. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 20:24:07 GMT SBBOZ2QLRJLLRABKQGZHHXITQU https://www.reuters.com/world/us-urges-discussions-with-china-practical-nuclear-risk-reduction-steps-2024-01-18/Reuters世界
US says 'no way' to solve Israel security, Gaza war without Palestinian stateThere is "no way" to solve Israel's long-term security challenges in the region and the short-term challenges of rebuilding Gaza without the establishment of a Palestinian state, U.S. State Department spokesperson Matthew Miller said on Thursday. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 20:16:50 GMT 6GUEP6XSOVIGTCGTTACSEO22JY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-says-no-way-solve-israeli-security-gaza-war-without-palestinian-state-2024-01-18/Simon Lewis, Humeyra Pamuk世界中东地区
Iran-Pakistan flare-up rooted in restive borderlands, not Mideast strifeAn Iranian strike on Pakistan this week that drew a rapid military riposte and raised fears of greater regional turmoil was driven by Iran's efforts to reinforce its internal security rather than its ambitions for the Middle East, according to three Iranian officials, one Iranian insider and an analyst. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 20:10:59 GMT 6XD6DWILZRKIZFH46PNETWKETY https://www.reuters.com/world/iran-pakistan-flare-up-rooted-restive-border-lands-not-mideast-strife-2024-01-18/Parisa Hafezi, Charlotte Greenfield, Gibran Peshimam世界
US-owned bulk carrier approached by drones off Yemen -British security firmBritish maritime security firm Ambrey on Thursday said that a Marshall Islands-flagged US-owned bulk carrier reported that four unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) approached and circled the vessel approximately 87 miles southeast of Yemen's city of Mukalla. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 20:09:36 GMT HVMQ5P3Y4NILHDD7DD6VMQFMUY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-owned-bulk-carrier-approached-by-drones-off-yemen-british-security-firm-2024-01-18/Reuters世界中东地区
UN chief urges maximum restraint by Iran, PakistanUnited Nations Secretary-General Antonio Guterres urged Iran and Pakistan to "exercise maximum restraint to avoid a further escalation of tensions" after an exchange of military strikes between the countries, his spokesperson said on Thursday. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 19:26:59 GMT YT3FKDOX5NLB3AARL574TIPS https://www.reuters.com/world/a-chief-urges-maximum-restraint-by-iran-pakistan-2024-01-18/Reuters世界
US targets more Houthi anti-ship missiles aimed at Red SeaThe United States launched additional strikes early on Thursday targeting two Houthi anti-ship missiles that were being prepared to fire into the Red Sea and deemed "an imminent threat" to shipping and U.S. Navy vessels in the region, the U.S. military said. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 19:06:59 GMT 5DFSIV5GCVKG5CWVQO2PQQRVH4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-targets-more-houthi-anti-ship-missiles-aimed-red-sea-2024-01-18/Reuters世界中东地区
What is behind Iran-Pakistan attacks and could conflict escalate?Iran launched missile strikes on three different countries this week - Iraq, Syria and Pakistan - while proxy militant groups it backs continue to target U.S. and Western interests and fight Israel, stoking fears of conflict that could engulf the Middle East and spread to other regions. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 18:43:57 GMT I5UMFP47SVPDXNEGOOBXUWHXFA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iran-its-proxies-widening-violence-middle-east-2024-01-18/John Davison世界中东地区
Seafarers' safety must be enhanced in Red Sea, shipping industry saysCountries in the Red Sea region need to enhance security to protect seafarers at risk as attacks on merchant shipping worsen, industry officials said on Thursday. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 18:35:57 GMT 76VE456SFRLWPAB4V6S5YXNQBQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/seafarers-safety-must-be-enhanced-red-sea-shipping-industry-says-2024-01-18/Jonathan Saul世界中东地区
Mexico, Chile refer Israel-Hamas conflict to ICC over potential crimesMexico and Chile expressed "growing worry" on Thursday over "an escalation of violence" after several months of war between Israel and Hamas in a referral to the International Criminal Court (ICC) over possible crimes. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 18:34:36 GMT MCNQ4HSUQRNHTJVMA5UEGJE7FU https://www.reuters.com/world/mexico-chile-refer-israel-hamas-conflict-court-over-possible-crimes-2024-01-18/Kylie Madry世界
US warns of Russian effort to tilt 2024 elections in Europe against UkraineThe United States believes Russia will conduct "information operations" aimed at turning opinion in Europe against Ukraine as countries across the continent go to the polls this year, the head of the State Department's office for disinformation said on Thursday. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 18:09:27 GMT 45FZ34IY6NM7BIJ5QQULGNJRJE https://www.reuters.com/world/us-warns- Russian-effort-tilt-2024-elections-europe-against-ukraine-2024-01-18/Simon Lewis世界
